Name: Any Yamaers?
Description: Obtain any piece of Oathplate Armor
LongDescription:
Obtain any piece of Oathplate Armor
Can not be crafted, can not be from a contract.

Name: I FKING LOVE COMMON PURPLES
Description: Obtain the most common purple from any raid
LongDescription:
CoX: Prayer Scrolls
ToB: Avernic
ToA: Lightbearer or Fang

Name: I'm getting an Eye of Ay-ak-ak-ak-ak-ak-ak-ak
LongDescription: Obtain the Eye of Ayak from Doom

Name: Making early game tiles is hard
Description: Obtain a unique drop from each of these early game bosses!
LongDescription:
Amoxliatl - Moxi, Pendant of ates, or Glacial Temotli
Barrows (No bolt racks)
Hueycoatl - Huberte, Wand, Tome, Hide, Seeds, or Pages
Moons of Peril (No Darts)
Royal Titans (Anything but Pages)

Name: It's called a passive tile for a reason
Description: Obtain a boss pet with a drop rate of 1/4000 or more
LongDescription: Includes: DKS, Corp, GWD bosses (except Nex), WT, Temp, Zulrah

Name: The Avatar
Description: Obtain the 4 Quartz from DT2 bosses
LongDescription: Requires Ice Quartz, Smoke Quartz, Shadow Quartz, and Blood Quartz

Name: A sqrd tile
Description: Obtain a dragon mask from a hard/elite clue
LongDescription: Obtain any dragon mask from a hard or elite clue

Name: More new content!
Description: Obtain two uniques from Yama/Doom of Mocha

Name: Defense Drainer
Description: Obtain a Dragon Warhammer, Bandos Godsword, Ralos, or Eldermaul

Name: Why do you ask for a tile you know you'll hate?
LongDescription: Obtain either an Arcane, Elysian, or Spectral Sigil.

Name: Valamore Scavenger Hunt
LongDescription:

Tonalztics of Ralos
S'mol heredit
Any sunfire armor (only counts once, MUST KILL SOL to count)

Hueycoatl:
Dragon Hunter Wand
Hubert

Amoxliatl
Moxi

Doom of Mokhaiotl:
Avernic Treads
Eye of Ayak
Mokhaiotl Cloth
Dom
